job_history.work_description: Maintained and operated weapons and communications systems of the $3,000,000 M2A2 Bradley Infantry Fighting Vehicle as a qualified gunner. Maintained mechanical functions and marksman qualification for the M16 service rifle. Trained in Infantry tactics according to Army doctrine on Fire and Maneuver. Sustained 24 hour readiness for training and deployment as part of a combined arms team. Provided leadership and training for subordinate soldiers in my charge. Maintained personal physical fitness for military duty.

Researched and identified vendors for commercial equipment, parts and supplies for infrastructure/building maintenance by work order. Data entry and procurement of commercial freight. Received, inspected, offloaded, warehoused and data entered commercial freight into inventory. Managed accounts and inventory for contract tools and equipment via database. Operated a vertical forklift. Processed defective product for return and reclamations.

Managed crew of 8 to 12 Stock Associates in general floor merchandising. Managed store 'Pull Program' for stock management and inventory control. Managed store 'Pick-it' program for high value merchandise. Setup and stocked seasonal merchandising displays from schematic plans (e.g., Back to School, Christmas). Received, inspected, offloaded, categorized and scanned commercial freight into inventory. Operated a vertical forklift. Processed defective product for return and reclamations.

Maintained and repaired power plant/engine systems and subsystems of the $24,000,000 MH53E Helicopter. Conducted pre-flight maintenance and safety inspections. Facilitated launch and recovery of aircraft as part of a ground crew. Handled and disposed of hazardous material in accordance with local, State and Federal regulations. Inventoried maintenance shop tools and equipment. Maintained personal physical fitness for military duty.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Provided leadership and training for subordinate soldiers in the military and managed crew of 8 to 12 Stock Associates in a retail setting, showing strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Inventory Management
skills.explanation: Managed accounts and inventory for contract tools and equipment via database, and received, inspected, offloaded, warehoused and data entered commercial freight into inventory, indicating strong proficiency in inventory management.

skills.name: Logistics
skills.explanation: Researched and identified vendors for commercial equipment, parts and supplies, and processed defective product for return and reclamations, showing strong proficiency in logistics.

skills.name: Mechanical Maintenance
skills.explanation: Maintained and repaired power plant/engine systems and subsystems of the MH53E Helicopter, and maintained mechanical functions of the M2A2 Bradley Infantry Fighting Vehicle, indicating strong proficiency in mechanical maintenance.

skills.name: Data Entry
skills.explanation: Processed commercial freight into inventory via data entry, showing a solid working proficiency in data entry.

skills.name: Forklift Operation
skills.explanation: Operated a vertical forklift in a warehouse setting, showing a solid working proficiency in forklift operation.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Setup and stocked seasonal merchandising displays from schematic plans, showing some practical experience in project management.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Sustained 24 hour readiness for training and deployment as part of a combined arms team, showing some practical experience in time management.
